CustomField.formula: CASE(Platform_Name__c, 'Instagram', LEFT($Api.Partner_Server_URL_260, FIND('/services', $Api.Partner_Server_URL_260)) + '/resource/InstagramLogo', 'Facebook', LEFT($Api.Partner_Server_URL_260, FIND('/services', $Api.Partner_Server_URL_260)) + '/resource/FacebookLogo', LEFT($Api.Partner_Server_URL_260, FIND('/services', $Api.Partner_Server_URL_260)) + '/resource/LinkedIn_Icon' )
CustomField.label: Platform_Img
